ComicInfo.Title: The Last Sinbad Story; Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf? Chapter Two of Happily Ever After
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the denizens of Fabletown choose sides, Snow White and Rose Red prepare for the battle of their lives. Part two of the epic 'Happily Ever After' storyline continues here, featuring a backup story of Sinbad: The Last Story Ever Told, by Oz artist extraordinaire Eric Shanower.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 10:51:00. [CVDB459659]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/fables-142-whos-afraid-of-the-big-bad-wolf-chapter/4000-459659/
